ShadingPreset.ShortHelp: Shades the surfaces of the geometry.

ShadingWithSharpEdgesPreset.ShortHelp: Shades with edges, except the smooth ones.

ShadingWithEdgesHiddenEdgesPreset.ShortHelp: Displays a shaded view of the model.

ShadingWithSharpSmoothEdgesPreset.ShortHelp: Shades with edges, whether smooth or not.

ShadingWithMaterialPreset.ShortHelp: Displays the material applied onto your object.

WireframePreset.ShortHelp: Displays object's edges and lines only.

ShadingIllustrationPreset.ShortHelp: Applies a wireframe mode in which visible edges and object outlines are displayed.

Shaded.Label: Shaded
Shaded.ShortHelp: Displays a shaded view of the model.

Illustration.Label: Illustration
Illustration.ShortHelp: Applies a wireframe mode in which visible edges and object outlines are displayed.

Edges.Label: Edges
Edges.ShortHelp: Defines if and how edges are displayed.

NoEdges.Label: No edges
NoEdges.ShortHelp: Displays the model without any edge.

WithEdges.Label: All edges
WithEdges.ShortHelp: Displays the model with all its edges (smooth and sharp).

WithEdgesHiddenEdges.Label: With edges and hidden edges
WithEdgesHiddenEdges.ShortHelp: Displays a shaded view of the model with all edges, hidden or not.

WithEdgesNoSmoothEdges.Label: Only sharp edges
WithEdgesNoSmoothEdges.ShortHelp: Displays a shaded view of the model with sharp edges only.

Materials.Label: Display materials
Materials.ShortHelp: Displays the materials applied onto the geometry.

Appearance.Label: Default appearance
Appearance.ShortHelp: Defines the default material used for all objects.

Basic.Label: Basic
Basic.ShortHelp: Displays model with a  Material which use object's color as input.

GasLook.Label: Basic for design
GasLook.ShortHelp: Displays model with a  Shiny material which use object's color as input.

Clay.Label: Clay
Clay.ShortHelp: Displays model with a Clay's material appearance.

Plaster.Label: White mat plaster
Plaster.ShortHelp: Displays model with a  White mat plaster's material appearance.

GreyPlastic.Label: Grey shiny plastic
GreyPlastic.ShortHelp: Displays model with a  Grey shiny plastic's material appearance.

CastAluminum.Label: Cast aluminum
CastAluminum.ShortHelp: Displays model with a  Cast aluminum's material appearance.

MachinedAluminum.Label: Machined aluminum
MachinedAluminum.ShortHelp: Displays model with a  Machined aluminum's material appearance.

CastSteel.Label: Cast steel
CastSteel.ShortHelp: Displays model with a  Cast steel's material appearance.

BrushedSteel.Label: Brushed steel
BrushedSteel.ShortHelp: Displays model with a Brushed steel's material appearance.

MachinedSteel.Label: Machined stainless steel
MachinedSteel.ShortHelp: Displays model with a Machined stainless steel appearance.

Copper.Label: Copper
Copper.ShortHelp: Displays model with a Copper's material appearance.

Brass.Label: Brass
Brass.ShortHelp: Displays model with a Brass' material appearance.

Outline.Label: Outline
Outline.ShortHelp: Defines whether the model's outline is displayed or not.

Points.Label: Points
Points.ShortHelp: Activates or deactivates the display of points.

Axis.Label: Axes
Axis.ShortHelp: Activates or deactivates the display of axes and axis systems.

Planes.Label: Planes
Planes.ShortHelp: Activates or deactivates the display of planes.

Wires.Label: Wires
Wires.ShortHelp: Activates or deactivates the display of wires.

Vertices.Label: Wires vertices
Vertices.Shorthelp: Activates or deactivates the display of vertices.

Ambience.Label: Ambience
Ambience.ShortHelp: Defines the ambience to be applied to the scene.

Perspective.Label: Perspective
Perspective.ShortHelp: Toggles between perspective and parallel views.
